summary:
Are you a visionary startup founder or an individual committed to making a meaningful difference? I'm here to amplify your journey. Furthermore, feel free to reach out if you're in search of a collaborator or interested in joining a side project. I'm here to connect and explore exciting possibilities together!

🌟 Who Am I?

I bring over 6 years of dynamic experience cultivating startups across diverse sectors including advertising, fashion, luxury, media, hospitality and real estate. My journey has spanned from the conceptualization phase to scaling projects to a thriving daily user base.

🔹 Technical Expertise: Proficient in Ruby and Ruby on Rails, Amazon Web Services, PostgreSQL, MySQL, JavaScript, full-text search engines, LLMs and NLPs. I believe that there's no one-tech-that-fits-all purposes.

🔹 User-Centric Approach: My philosophy centers on crafting solutions that resonate with your audience, resulting in remarkable user experiences.


⏰ Currently based in the CEST time zone.

projects.title: Cellular Automata for Enzyme Kinetics
projects.description: Development of a solution to simulate enzyme kinetics of a particular enzyme and substrate. Besides being based on a discrete model easily customizable, the simulator displays an animated representation of enzyme-catalysed reactions and produces the Michaelis-Menten kinetics parameters using the double reciprocal Lineweaver-Burk.

projects.title: Application to perform encryption and decryption of files, as well as to make digital signatures and integrity control using a set of daemons
projects.description:
"System to perform encryption and decryption of files, as well as to makes digital signatures and integrity control using a set of daemons " was a project developed to Computer Security class. This project aimed to assess the students' skills in Computer Sciences field. The system not only implemented cryptographic hash functions, such as SHA1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, MD4 and
MD5, but also cryptosystems (RSA and DSA) and a cryptographic function (AES). The system perform all operations using a set of daemons to monitor some folders created by the application. The programming language used was Java.

contributors.headline: OrderCare Developer OSS/BSS, Experts in Systems Integration

projects.title: Drug management system for case-study through its component with Design of Graphical User Interfaces
projects.description: "Drug management system for case-study through its component with Design of Graphical User Interfaces" was a project that allows an fast and precise search of a specific drug, by its components like INN (Internation Nonproprietary Name), brand drug name, pediatric indication and toxicity. This project was developed for the master's thesis of a student of pharmaceutical sciences.

projects.title: Billing management system available to users as SaaS
projects.description: "Billing management system available to users as SaaS" was a project to the course Software Engineering. This project aims to evaluate all software engineering procedures on development software, since requirements analysis until implementation and testing. The current project was developed in partnership with a local company. Was divided in four tasks, starting with requirements analysis. The second task was about the creation of abstract models,  with perspective of  interaction, structural and architectural of the system. The third task was the implementation, testing and delivery of the system to customer. The last tasks was the creation of a document where explain all functionalities of the system, the API functions used, the explanation of how system can be implemented and adapted. The data bases system used was Windows Azure, the programming language used in client and server aplication and API was C#. All the system is ready to be used in Cloud environment.

contributors.headline: Researcher at HASLab -- INESC TEC & DCC FC Universidade do Porto

projects.title: Design of a basic programming language and its Compiler to MIPS
projects.description: "Design of a basic programming language and its Compiler to MIPS" was a project to the course Formal Languages and Compilers. This project aimed to evaluate the basic techniques and design of compilers. This project had two parts. The first, part aims to implement analysis techniques lexical, syntactic and semantic analysis. The last part will be to implement processing algorithms and generation of low-level code, this case MIPS.

projects.title: Breast Cancer diagnosis using Naive-Bayes and Knn algorithms for binary classification and Generic population-based metaheuristic optimization algorithm, Evolutionary Algorithm - Genetic Algorithm, for improvement in detection of this Cancer
projects.description: "Breast Cancer diagnosis using Naive-Bayes and Knn algorithms for binary classification and Generic population-based meta-heuristic optimization algorithm, Evolutionary Algorithm - Genetic Algorithm, for improvement in detection of this Cancer" was a project implemented for the course "Artificial Intelligence". This project attempts to assess knowledge of implementation of some classifiers for Breast Cancer diagnosis, defining their type of tumor (benign or malignant), using a DataSet. The DataSet used to this project is available at [http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Breast+Cancer+Wisconsin+%28Diagnostic%29]. In this project is also implemented a Evolutionary Algorithm - Genetic Algorithm to improve this diagnosis, using less attributes than originally keeping the same, or even better, accuracy.

profile_positions.description: Adnovation is the new kid on the block in terms of performance advertising technologies for mid-to-large sized ad networks. Emerging in a static industry where tech providers still charge their clients on volume based models, Adnovation stands to position itself against the trend, providing a one-stop-shop technology & centralizing client satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Rails Developer

profile_positions.description:
Development of a solution to model the enzyme kinetics of a particular enzyme and substrate. For a given concentration of enzyme and substrate, the simulator calculates how quickly the enzyme stays saturated with a particular substrate, and the maximum rate it can achieve.
The project was developed in Processing language.
